propDescriptions.color: The color of the link. To learn how to add your own colors, check out Themed components—Extend colors.
propDescriptions.overlay: If true, the ::after psuedo element is added to cover the area of interaction. The parent of the overlay Link should have relative CSS position.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.underline: Controls when the link should have an underline.
propDescriptions.variant: Applies the theme link styles. To learn how to add your own variants, check out Themed components—Extend variants.

slotDescriptions.endDecorator: The component used to render the end decorator.
slotDescriptions.root: The component used to render the root.
slotDescriptions.startDecorator: The component used to render the start decorator.
